item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, January 25, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. How far can you get in 40 minutes from each subway station in NYC? (83 points | 29 comments)
2. Pixelfed Hit 500K Users (57 points | 3 comments)
3. To make electricity cheaper and greener, connect the world's grids (18 points | 9 comments)
4. I got OpenAI o1 to play the boardgame Codenames and it's super good (70 points | 40 comments)
5. How to build your own ZX80/ZX81 (2019) (27 points | 5 comments)
6. Show HN: I built a DIY plane spotting system at home (13 points | 1 comment)
7. An overview of gradient descent optimization algorithms (2016) (73 points | 12 comments)
8. Advent of Code 2024 and BQN (29 points | 2 comments)
9. Life lessons from the first half-century of my career (235 points | 73 comments)
10. The Mythical IO-Bound Rails App (47 points | 11 comments)
11. Inboxbooster (YC W17) Is Hiring ( | hide)
12. Show HN: Cs16.css – CSS library based on Counter Strike 1.6 UI (698 points | 118 comments)
13. Hacker infects 18,000 "script kiddies" with fake malware builder (31 points | 4 comments)
14. TinyZero (136 points | 22 comments)
15. File Explorer is merged to Helix editor (190 points | 22 comments)
16. Show HN: Trolling SMS spammers with Ollama (252 points | 92 comments)
17. Show HN: Using YOLO to Detect Office Chairs in 40M Hotel Photos (171 points | 92 comments)
18. Show HN: Lightpanda, an open-source headless browser in Zig (249 points | 118 comments)
19. Wild – A fast linker for Linux (343 points | 164 comments)
20. Doorbell camera catches rare footage of meteorite striking home's front walkway (9 points | 1 comment)
21. The FizzBuzz that did not get me the job (269 points | 209 comments)
22. A phishing attack involving g.co, Google's URL shortener (319 points | 135 comments)
23. Snowdrop OS – a homebrew operating system from scratch, in assembly language (266 points | 55 comments)
24. Show HN: Habby – A straightforward bullet journal with habit tracking (24 points | 4 comments)
25. First Look: Loops, by Pixelfed – Decentralised TikTok Competitor (2024) (150 points | 91 comments)
26. The hidden complexity of scaling WebSockets (149 points | 53 comments)
27. Subpixel Snake [video] (250 points | 48 comments)
28. Her dad, the 10k records he left behind and a viral lesson in grief (119 points | 61 comments)
29. You could have invented Fenwick trees (119 points | 23 comments)
30. Ask HN: Why buy domains and 301 redirect them to me? (345 points | 114 comments)
